casebody.data:
FLORIDA BOARD OF BAR EXAMINERS, Petitioner(s)
v.
Re: Donald L. FERGUSON, Respondent(s) CASE NO.: SC17-1494 Supreme Court of Florida. JULY 10, 2018 CANADY, C.J., and LEWIS, QUINCE, POLSTON, and LABARGA, JJ., concur. PARIENTE and LAWSON, JJ., dissent.

Applicant Donald L. Ferguson's Motion for Rehearing and Motion to Supplement the Record are hereby denied.
